commit.message:
re PR tree-optimization/21541 (gcc.c-torture/execute/20031215-1.c compilation fails)

        PR 21541
        * ifcvt.c (noce_process_if_block): Avoid conversion when the
        memory destination is readonly.

From-SVN: r99951
